version_description:
We periodically release new updates to help improve your Dubsmash experience...like a bawse. In this edition: bug fixes and performance improvements!

No one likes bugs. Everyone likes improvements.

You can find new Community Moments with different themes every day in the Moments tab.

version_name: 4.0.2 Improvements:- Vertical video is back! We wanna see your #dubsmashchallenge- Your previously created Sounds can now be found in Settings- Plus other improvements; we'll have another update with more top-requested features soon!---You asked

version_description:
You asked, we answered. We’re pleased to announce some major updates to Dubsmash!

Introducing:

Videos - Don’t just listen to your favorite sounds from movies & TV shows, watch them!
Memes - Think you’re funny? Make a meme and share

version_name: 4.0.2 Improvements:- Vertical video is back! We wanna see your #dubsmashchallenge- Your previously created Sounds can now be found in Settings- Plus other improvements; we'll have another update with more top-requested features soon!---You asked

version_description:
You asked, we answered. We’re pleased to announce some major updates to Dubsmash!

Introducing:

Videos - Don’t just listen to your favorite sounds from movies & TV shows, watch them!
Memes - Think you’re funny? Make a meme and share

Version 4.0.1 Improvements:
- Vertical video is back! We wanna see your #dubsmashchallenge
- Your previously created Sounds can now be found in Settings
- Plus other improvements; we'll have another update with more top-requested features soon!

- Pause & resume during recording
- Add a caption to your Dub
- Video quality improvements

Guess what? Filters are *finally* back.
And we've added a new way for you to watch Dubs from other users - see if you can get yourself trending!
Plus a bunch of other bug fixes.

Guess what? Filters are *finally* back.
And we've added a new way for you to watch Dubs from other users - see if you can get yourself trending!
Plus a bunch of other bug fixes.

- Follow & watch other Dubsmashers
- Like a Dub if you think it's great
- See how many views & likes your own Dubs get (on your Profile)
- 2 NEW filters added

Happy new year! We've got a lot in store for Dubsmash in 2020 - first up we have a new way to discover new videos and users on the Explore tab!

- Plus some iOS 13 bug fixes & performance improvements

Happy new year! We've got a lot in store for Dubsmash in 2020 - first up we have a new way to discover new videos and users on the Explore tab!

- Plus some iOS 13 bug fixes & performance improvements

NEW ON DUBSMASH:
- Create videos in slowwww-mo (or fast-mo, if that's your thing)
- Add multiple text stickers to your videos
- Plus we fixed some glitches & squashed some iOS 13 bugs
